summary: Each year, we audit the IRS's financial statements and issue opinions regarding these statements and related internal controls (i.e., processes in place to ensure the proper authorization and recording of transactions). In our FY 2023 audit we identified new issues related to how IRS manages the security, access, and configuration of its IT systems. For example, IRS did not consistently create a plan of action...
title: IRS Financial Reporting: Improvements Needed in Information System and Other Controls
